conversation.timed.out: Our conversation timed out.  You can try again later.
conversation.try.again.or.exit: That is not one of the choices. Try again, or type *exit*.
conversation.try.again.yes.no: That is not one of the choices. Try *yes* or *no*.
general.safe.this.time: Ok, *%s* is safe this time around.
cognitive.parse.problem.destroy: I'm having problems understanding the name of your virtual server. To destroy a virtual server use *virtual server destroy [virtualserver]*
cognitive.parse.problem.reboot: I'm having problems understanding the name of your virtual server. To reboot a virtual server use *virtual server destroy [virtualserver]*
cognitive.parse.problem.start: I'm having problems understanding the name of your virtual server. To start a virtual server use *virtual server destroy [virtualserver]*
cognitive.parse.problem.stop: I'm having problems understanding the name of your virtual server. To stop a virtual server use *virtual server destroy [virtualserver]*
help.vs.show: Lists all of the virtual servers.
vs.destroy.confirm: Are you sure that you want to destroy *%s*?
vs.reboot.confirm: Are you sure that you want to reboot *%s*?
vs.stop.confirm: Are you sure that you want to stop *%s*?
